about.title: About me
about.primary: This is where you can describe about yourself. The more you describe about yourself, the more chances you have!
about.secondary: Extra Information about you! like hobbies and your goals.

projects.title: Développement d'une plateforme d'intermédiation sociale ent
projects.description: The social intermediary platform aims to connect people with shared interests, facilitating social interactions and fostering a sense of community. It offers user profiles, messaging, and group features for easy engagement and connection.
